channel.title: Dragon claw special?
channel.description: ok so i have a server... and i have the code for d claws... but it says non existing id? does any1 no how to change that??? Also does anyone know how to make the d claws have a 4 hit special??? if u do can u post the code please? thanks

item.title: Dragon claw special?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

You must add the dragon claws item id into your item.cfg, after that it should be renamed to “Dragon Claws.” For the dragon claw special, there are many easy tutorials for adding the special.

Read full topic
